description: Standard fields for Australian healthcare document de-identification

fields.name: Full Name
fields.description: Patient or person's full name, including first and last name and any middle names

fields.name: Date of Birth
fields.description: Date of birth in any format (e.g., 01/01/1980, 1 January 1980, DOB: 01-01-1980)

fields.name: Medicare Number
fields.description: Australian Medicare card number, typically 10-11 digits, sometimes with a reference number suffix

fields.name: Physical Address
fields.description: Full residential or mailing address including street number, street name, suburb, state, and postcode
